entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the owner of the locket. The text states 'had fallen out of Dumbledore’s pocket.'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who picks up the locket and finds something wrong with it. The text states 'He turned the locket over in his hands... Harry knew...'

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: The Pensieve is mentioned as a place where Harry remembers seeing a different locket. The text states 'This was neither as large as the locket he remembered seeing in the Pensieve...'

relationships.description: Harry finds a locket that belongs to Dumbledore. The text states 'had fallen out of Dumbledore’s pocket.'
Harry remembers seeing a different locket in the Pensieve. The text states 'This was neither as large as the locket he remembered seeing in the Pensieve...'
